titles.title: To require the Secretary of Education to waive certain regulations in considering an application submitted by the Winona R-III School District, Missouri.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary and Vocational Education.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Education to waive certain requirements for local effort in excess of $200,000 in awarding funds to the Winona R-III School District, Missouri, under Federal law relating to impact aid.
